description: Browse, inspect, convert, and resize images from a local library. Generate thumbnails, extract metadata, and retrieve files in common formats. Streamline image prep for previews, responsive layouts, and format optimization.

capabilities.name: list_images
capabilities.description: Lists all available images in the images directory

capabilities.name: get_image
capabilities.description: Returns a specific image by filename from the images directory. Supports JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP, and BMP formats.

capabilities.name: get_image_metadata
capabilities.description: Returns metadata about an image (filename, size, format, dimensions) without loading the full image

capabilities.name: convert_image
capabilities.description: Converts an image to a different format (JPG, PNG, WebP, GIF). Returns the converted image.

capabilities.name: resize_image
capabilities.description: Resizes an image to specified dimensions. Can maintain aspect ratio or force exact dimensions.

capabilities.name: create_thumbnail
capabilities.description: Creates a thumbnail version of an image with specified maximum dimension

capabilities.name: get_image_info
capabilities.description: Gets detailed technical information about an image including dimensions, format, color space, etc.
